channel.title: Homes on Stephane Shao
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Stephane Shao

item.description: I am … … a senior data scientist at Etsy. My team sits at the intersection of Engineering and Statistics as we develop new methodologies for online experimentation. Contact me at : stephaneshao [@] alumni [dot] harvard [dot] edu

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I have been a teaching assistant at Harvard University for the following courses: STAT 131 - Time Series and Prediction (Fall 2017) STAT 213 - Statistical Inference II (Spring 2017) STAT 210 - Probability I (Fall 2016) STAT 111 - Introduction to Theoretical Statistics (Spring 2016) STAT 110 - Introduction to Probability (Fall 2015)
